body:
So yesterday I tried some avicus 1.7 pvp. the blockhit is pretty neat, with the reduced kb and damage, the eating this is wierd but epic, and the bow punching thing looks cool. The only problems i have are the constant lag spikes, and the bow sensitivity thing is awkward and hard to pull back in my opinion. So, as a pvp nerd, i would like to ask

Does anyone have any good 1.7 animation mods? Also can a have some links please?

i was going to ask for a cps counter too but i realize that i dont even get good cps and that would lag my 5 year old Macintosh.

your boi

rattle

replies.body:
Labymod is absolutely the best. Its super smooth, plus you dont need glitchy ass forge, and you can directly download other pvp mods with it (togglesprint, optifine, armour status, etc)

it has a toggleable cps mod built in too if you want it
replies.body_tagged:
Labymod is absolutely the best. Its super smooth, plus you dont need glitchy ass forge, and you can directly download other pvp mods with it (togglesprint, optifine, armour status, etc)

it has a toggleable cps mod built in too if you want it

replies.body:
Laby mod was laggy for me so i use 5zig with old animations mod, old animations also comes with toggle sprint, also u can  punch blocks (not break) while eating , have old rod scaling etc... 

http://oldanimationsmod.tk

https://5zig.net

Make sure you download them for same versions
When you have both files open 5zig and pick to download it with another mod, then find the old animations.jar and select it, wait to download 
To acess old animations settings press esc then look top left and if youwant to acess toggle sprint options go to top left again and select "mods"
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Yes, it should. Dowbload togglesprint for whatever version ur downloading 5zig for, then select the .jar of togglesneak/sprint when 5zig asks if you want to download another mod with it, if you also want optifine then hold shift and click on both toggle and optifine, then download.
